body:
Presentations and Audio from the last day of the workshop have been posted:
http://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2012-copenhagen


Thanks to Nicolas Roy, Velux, and the Royal Danish Academy for hosting the
workshop.
Thanks to Greg for recording the audio.


I personally look forward to attending the next workshop (at NREL?).


Andy
